originalText.text: The new management/staff at Pure Polish is extremely friendly, welcoming, and professional. The salon is clean, inviting, and has an impressive collection of nail polish, including organic options. I had an amazing gel manicure + pedicure experience here and will be returning on a regular basis. Definitely my favorite & best nail salon in the neighborhood! ðŸ˜Š

originalText.text:
This would have been 5 stars had it not been ruined by my last experience! I booked in with a specific person who wasnâ€™t there so I was seen by somebody different which was a shame as Iâ€™d specified for a reason! When having the polish removed, the nail technician proceeded to overly file my nails and as a result they almost felt paper thin and in terrible condition. One nail began to burn and when I looked it was so think you could feel how thin the nail had become.
Since then the nail has felt bruised! The SNS powder was not done to the normal quality with chips appearing within 2-3 days. Normally they last a week!
Iâ€™ve now resorted to removing the polish myself because Iâ€™m so disappointed with the service! I wonâ€™t be coming back as I want to actually keep my nails!

Update on review - my nails are badly damaged and the one nail that was filed too thin is still bruised and red! Iâ€™ve never had so much damage caused to my natural nails!

originalText.text:
Wish i could give zero stars. Worst dip
Manicure I have ever received by Jin. She was sloppy and messy. Did not clean the dip off of my cuticles. She skipped the last filing step and when I asked her file my nails she rolled her eyes. Left to another client before she finished my manicure. I had to show my nails to the owner before another lady came
To finish them. And less than 24 hours later an entire nail of polish popped off. Save your money and go elsewhere.

originalText.text: Before the Thanksgiving holiday, I enjoyed a spa pedicure and organic gel manicure at Polish. The new management renovated the space and the salon has an elegant and warmly relaxing ambience for self-care. The teamâ€™s attention to detail, be it the skillful precision of the mani pedi, the array of polish types and colors (organic in the mix), the phone holders at each station, or the cleanliness of the space, were assuring elements of my experience. To package it up, the hospitable service had me convinced that Iâ€™ll be returning again soon :). Iâ€™ve been around the salons in the neighborhood and Polish is by far the best.
